item.title: Sudoku Solver
item.description: Used python and tkinter to create a GUI sudoku solver that combines manual and backtracking approaches for quicker solving.

item.title: Cut the Rope
item.description: This is a mini imitation of the popular android game Cut The Rope using python.
This project is a terminal imitation of the popular android game 2048.
